oracleio.author: Edred Thorsson, Runecaster's Handbook.
oracleio.entry: All the runes meanings are shown here so you get a mixture of meanings with one rune falling into the meaning of another rune.
Money matters. Psychic energies. Financial strength and prosperity of the present and near future.
What opposed you (perhaps physical). Conflicts and complexities of an aggressive nature; psychological problems.
Sources of inspiration and intellectual expression. Communications and transmissions; points things back to sources in the past.
Travels - inner or outer. What is right or not right; what move to make; decisions; returns.
Creativity. Erotic relationships. Opening up of new ways; opportunities; information.
What will be given to you. All matters of an exchanging nature; contracts; personal relationships.
Relationships, friends. What will give you happiness. Gain; accomplishments; that which is wished for.
Area of possible crisis leading to transformation. The uncontrolled forces in the unconscious, which are usually of a disruptive nature and which usually originate in the past.
What resists you (psychically). Source of discontent. Restrictive forces in the unconscious; fears, anxieties; feelings of guilt.
What is constraining you. Blocks; stultified conditions; grievances; anything that the individual is not prepared to let go of; the formation of the personality; conditioning.
Where rewards can be expected. Relationship with the natural environment. Hopes and expectations; turning points; gradual changes; results of earlier actions.
Hidden influences, state of whole being. Relationship with the numinous environment. The driving forces in the unconscious; motivation; sense of purpose.
How you will find joy. The deepest creative part of the unconscious; the hidden realm of higher material that is waiting to come to fruition and birth; hidden talents; occult or psychic abilities.
Thing that needs attention. Way to the gods. The strong protective side in the unconscious; the influence which will protect you; religious aspirations.

What will guide you. Position of the higher self in relations to the unconscious; the direction in which you will be guided by the higher self; the ability to establish contact between the higher self and the unconscious.

Cognitive state. Legal matters. Ideals. Creative energies in the martial sense; where your strengths lie; where to direct your energies in taking initiatives; honor and justice, leadership and authority.
What provides growth and beauty. Fertility; birth' rebirth; growth; maternity; family life; feminine mysteries.
With what or whom you should work. Erotic relations. Adaptability; relationships with others; joint efforts; cooperation; sexuality.
Overall psychic state. Attitude toward death. People at large; attitude toward others; other people's attitudes towards you; legal matters, friends and enemies; intellect.
State of emotional Balance. What will test you. Emotions; stability; imagination; psychic matters; affections.
What you should contemplate. Integration; gestation; expectations; progeny.

Area of unexpected synchronicity. Transmission; opposites; position between light and darkness; initiation; balance between the worlds outside time and space; cosmic consciousness; change from one thing into its opposite; new beginnings.
Greater family matters. National or community issues.Home life; country; spiritual heritage; experience; foundation; fundamental values; establishing.
